Articles.Content:
I eat Vanamonde, considering he's a banana.

My hill.

I eat you, because **Soup**er is your name, and then I put myself in an anti-drinking suit of armor.

My hill.

I summmon the Ender Dragon and the Wither, Then I kill them, along with you.

I also construct another hill, and build a really cool, but useless fortress.

I unplug your computer and kick you off the hill

My hill.

I detonate a Tsar Bomba.

My radioactive wasteland.....Oh look, a hill!

I cover the wasteland with concrete

My parking lot

I burn the concrete with acid.

My slightly-more-acidic wasteland
I eat it all my full belly
i chill in MY eaten hill that you didn't claim.

I feed Ethan a couple of flags with my name on them.

My hill.

I kill ethan and claim a hill on duna.

my duna hill

I claim the larger and in all possible ways more awesome hill next to jake9039's hill.

My awesome Duna hill.
I leave guys in the dust by claiming the even better dead kraken

I revive the kraken which destroys cirocco's craft.

my hill.

Problem fixed with a bit of file editing.

I have examined your potential optimal defense capabilities, and deemed them as being unable to withstand us. If you enter our hill with no intents of business, and attempt to defend yourself, you will be obliterated.

I simply go to your defences craft file and Wright missingno every were there's a number

my useless defences

Since your defences are now useless, i just patch the game to get rid of missingno. 

My fixed hill.

File retrieved through a quick hacking, and defenses adapted to compensate for cyber attacks. TCAWs ordered for automatic launch at the first sign of danger, with or without my consent. I suggest going elsewhere.
I walk into your hill with no signs of violence then I pull out an ak-47u causing your tcaws to launch at you base destroying it and killing us both

Luckily you seem to have forgotten the Thermal Infusion Defense Perimeter. It doesn't harm organic tissue... ***unless I want it to...***

Stepping past this perimeter will scan your entire matter stream, and let me see any objects you have on you.

Even if you managed getting in here and set off a few TCAWs, my base is composed of Trylereite based alloy. You think I didn't plan ahead for this? There's always risks.
I hire I sniper using depleted plutonium bullets he shoots of your defendes then you my hill

You can snipe more than a parsec away from conventional guns? Man, I'm in the wrong business.

In any case, I'm fairly certain that, if my defenses can stand up to a multi-million isoton blast of pure Sigma energy, I'm fairly certain a sniper, even with unconventional ammo will do nothing.

*(Don't tell him about the properties of Negative matter)*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-25T20:18:38Z" title="03/25/2015 08:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 25, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

i use antimatter to obliterate your defenses

my hill

[At least try to make sense. It's not like I'm just sitting around while you send in your antimatter warheads. I'd simply charge the TIDP up and use it as energy]

Though I do admit, this is a formidable weapon of yours. Definitely akin to a prototype for an early aged antimatter combustion interplanetary ballistic missile.

I see I need to further my defenses as well to stay on top of the game. Until then, I leave my duty to the TCAWs and the perimeter. 3 gridmarks in and you receive a warning. step in 2, and you will be destroyed instantly. 

Deal? Great.
I be a n00b and wake up my bedroom (sorry don't be a hill hog ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif))
